alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Red River; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 1:24PM CDT until June 13 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Titus County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 124 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Boxelder, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Boston, Clarksville, Boxelder, De Kalb, Maud, Dalby Springs, Avery, Annona, Spring Hill, Harts Bluff, Lydia and Cuthand. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
